title: Jennifer Lopez: Halftime
description:
Tig and Cheryl take on Jenny from the Block on today's episode of true story! From the Super Bowl to pole dancing to... Tom Cruise?!... nothing is out of bounds for our doc duo as they recap Netflix's look at the superstar known as J Lo.

*this episode spills beans* (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

  • Follow the show:
  • Instagram: @tigandcheryltruestory
  • Twitter: @TandCTrueStory
